displaytitle: "Hadra" Hydria: floral ornament and incised inscription
inscribed: Incised inscription below painted ornament on front of body: [See accession card for reproduction of inscription].

titles.title: "Hadra" Hydria: floral ornament and incised inscription

texts.textentryhtml: <font size="4">Formerly in collection of </font><font size="4">P. </font><font size="4">Puglioli; formerly with G. </font><font size="4">L. </font><font size="4">Feuardent; formerly in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art (No. GR709); sold by the Metropolitan in 1928; with Robert Garrett; purchased by the Museum in 1952.</font>

bibliography.boilertext: Egyptian, Greek & Roman antiquities: pottery, bronzes, sculputres, necklaces, iridescent glass, a gold victory wreath; Mexican & Central American pre-Columbian art; Japanese ivory carvings; Chinese jade; European ivories & objets d'art; bronze groups, (New York: Kende Galleries at Gimbel Brothers, 1951).
